articles.title: More than 2.8K lbs. of ground beef recalled over E. coli concerns - NewsNation
articles.description: The recalled beef was sold in stores across six states.

articles.title: After denials, 158-year-old retailer may file Chapter 11 - thestreet.com
articles.description: The retailer’s parent company repeatedly denied any plans to file for bankruptcy.

articles.description: Stocks slipped on Monday as investors sold their tech holdings heading into the end of 2025.

articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets mostly fall on penultimate day of the year - CNBC
articles.description: Investors will be focused on China's military exercises around Taiwan today, after it announced new drills surrounding the island Monday.

articles.title: Silver Prices Surge, Then Slump. How ‘Index Rebalancing’ Could Lead to More Wild Swings. - Barron's

articles.description: As the U.S. becomes a source of disorder, investors turn to silver and gold, writes Tyler Cowen.

articles.title: IRS sets 2026 business standard mileage rate at 72.5 cents per mile, up 2.5 cents - IRS (.gov)
articles.description: IR-2025-128, Dec. 29, 2025 — The Internal Revenue Service today announced that the optional standard mileage rate for business use of automobiles will increase by 2.5 cents in 2026.

articles.title: Michigan loses $540 million in climate-related grants, along with green manufacturing projects - ClickOnDetroit | WDIV Local 4
articles.description: A year ago, Michigan was expecting a windfall of federal funds to fuel a transition to clean energy, along with billions of dollars' worth of green manufacturing projects subsidized by the Biden administration's climate spending bills.

articles.description: A new study shows just how much AI slop has infiltrated YouTube.

articles.title: Bankruptcy success rate for student loan borrowers jumps to 87%, study finds - CNBC
articles.description: The success rate for student loan borrowers in bankruptcy has "jumped" to 87%, a study finds. But many people still don't pursue the option.
